semantic_description: Add OpenTelemetry instrumentation for RabbitMQ publish and consume operations so that related spans with standard messaging attributes appear in Jaeger traces.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the 'queueName' variable passed to BasicPublish or BasicConsume

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' or 'receive' depending on the call site
